mapper.select: select a.id, a.dict_sort as sort, a.dict_value as value, a.dict_label as label, a.dict_type as dictType, a.is_default as isDefault, a.is_del as isDel, a.create_user as createUser, a.create_time as createTime, a.remark as remark from t_dict_data as a inner join t_bpmn_conf as b on a.dict_value = b.form_code and b.is_lowcode_flow =1 and b.effective_status=1 where a.dict_type ='lowcodeflow' order by a.create_time desc

select a.id, a.dict_sort as sort, a.dict_value as value, a.dict_label as label, a.dict_type as dictType, a.is_default as isDefault, a.is_del as isDel, a.create_user as createUser, a.create_time as createTime, a.remark as remark from t_dict_data as a inner join t_bpmn_conf as b on a.dict_value = b.form_code and b.is_lowcode_flow =1 where a.dict_type ='lowcodeflow'
and b.effective_status = #{vo.processState}
and ( a.dict_label like CONCAT("%",#{vo.description},"%") or a.dict_value like CONCAT("%",#{vo.description},"%") )
order by a.create_time desc
